data.meta_description: Teach Democracy is a non-profit, non-partisan, community-based organization. Teach Democracy seeks to instill in our nation's youth a deeper understanding of citizenship through values expressed in our Constitution and its Bill of Rights and to educate young people to become active and responsible participants in our society.
